item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, January 21, 2025 at 12:30 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Startup Winter: Hacker News Lost Its Faith (245 points | 117 comments)
2. What I've learned about writing AI apps so far (44 points | 4 comments)
3. Kimi K1.5: Scaling Reinforcement Learning with LLMs (75 points | 8 comments)
4. We've lost our respect for complexity (83 points | 50 comments)
5. DeepSeek-R1 (1397 points | 498 comments)
6. Garmin's –$40B Pivot (36 points | 17 comments)
7. Open Source Alternative to Vercel, Netlify and Heroku (37 points | 21 comments)
8. Reverse engineering Call of Duty anti-cheat (334 points | 103 comments)
9. Perl Weekly Issue #704 – Perl Podcast (22 points | 4 comments)
10. Mixxx: GPL DJ Software (522 points | 108 comments)
11. 417-megapixel Andromeda galaxy panorama took over a decade to make (182 points | 61 comments)

13. I'm Peter Roberts, immigration attorney, who does work for YC and startups. AMA (305 points | 330 comments)
14. Official DeepSeek R1 Now on Ollama (186 points | 66 comments)
15. Context should go away for Go 2 (2017) (64 points | 54 comments)

18. Unlink vs. DEL – A deep dive into how it works internally in Redis (6 points | 4 comments)
19. Using eSIMs with devices that only have a physical SIM slot via a 9eSIM SIM car (341 points | 197 comments)
20. I am (not) a failure: Lessons learned from six failed startup attempts (413 points | 251 comments)
21. Celestial Navigation for Drones (182 points | 109 comments)
22. Guitar chord karaoke with Vamp, Chordino, and FFmpeg (2022) (100 points | 25 comments)
23. Poland fumes over US block on AI chips (63 points | 59 comments)
24. Where do those undergraduate divisibility problems come from? (133 points | 40 comments)
25. The Gilded Age novel that helps explain our fascination with Luigi Mangione (5 points | 3 comments)
26. Show HN: Personalized Duolingo (kind of) for vocabulary building (121 points | 30 comments)
27. The QUIC API OpenSSL will not provide (2021) (19 points | 6 comments)
28. Zork: The Great Inner Workings (2020) (173 points | 61 comments)
29. ROCm Device Support Wishlist (170 points | 125 comments)
